snippet.title: Frostpunk 2 | Beginner's Guide
snippet.description:
Get #Frostpunk 2: http://re.11bits.com/96b

We know the game is challenging, but by the end of this video, you should have a solid understanding of basic resource handling, the city’s societal, technological and economical structures and various in-game mechanics. Good luck, Steward! The city counts on you. #TheCityMustNotFall 

Listen to the game's OST by Piotr Musiał: https://soundtracks.lnk.to/frostpunk2

Follow Frostpunk on twitter/X: https://x.com/frostpunkgame
Join our discord: https://discord.com/invite/11bitstudios

00:00 Intro
01:06 Resources
02:35 Heat and the Generator
03:39 City's economy
04:19 City problems & tension
05:30 Communities and Factions
06:46 Managing relations with communities and factions
07:24 The City's direction - Zeitgeist
07:55 Expanding building area - Frostbreaking
08:48 Districts - types
09:26 Districts - Area Effects
10:24 Districts management - Requirements and Demand, Employment
12:05 Districts management - Expansion & Buildings 
13:02 Research Institute & Idea Tree
14:04 Council Hall & New Laws
15:52 Launching frostland expeditions
16:46 Locations of interest 
17:48 Connecting the city with frostland territories
18:38 Colonies
20:18 Ending
